About the Company: KSS Limited, formerly K Sera Sera Limited, is an India-based diversified media company, engaged in the business of production/distribution of movies and television serials. The Company through its subsidiaries and step down subsidiaries is into the business of Miniplexes, Digital Cinema, Education, Edutrainment, Online Trading, Project Consultancy, International Film Distribution, General Trading (UAE) and investment in gold mines. The Companys business segments include in-house production and distribution of motion pictures, distribution of motion pictures produced by third and television content production.
